title: Before the Harvest
description: HIS TIME HAS COMEWhen the Martins move their daughter from the crime-filled streets of St. Louis to the safety of the countryside, they don’t realize that the rural town they think of as a haven is loaded with secrets, and the farm they lease is far from safe. It is cursed land, and they’re about to find out the hard way that danger lurks everywhere, even in a small, peaceful farming community.AND SO HAS THEIRS...In a struggle to survive until dawn, will they make it, or will they only add to the rising body count?
author: Kimberly A. Bettes
